attributes.action: Let the public decide when it’s time for a general election
attributes.additional_details: The People has had enough of being told when and when we can’t vote for the people who represent us let us decide
attributes.background: Let the people decide when the general election will be and let the people decide who represents them and how long for

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
